content: the easy twisted headband is a simple two row repeat headband knitted with chunky yarn to create warmth during those winter months the pattern is completely customisable for any head size meaning the pattern is perfect for everyone materials 6 5mm needles straight circular or dpns 1 x 100g stylecraft chunky 144m yarn or similar alternative 1 x scissors 1 x tapestry needle *gauge not tested at time of writing*
